passive.name: All-In
passive.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer provides a Shield to an ally, the wearer's CRIT DMG increases by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{3}} turn(s). When the wearer's follow-up attack hits an enemy target, there is a <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong> base chance to increase the DMG taken by the attacked enemy target by <orangeStrong>{{5, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{6}} turn(s).
